title: 2 sentenced in assault over Jewish man's yarmulke at Boulder bar
text:
Published By: Denver Post - Today 
The suspect who pleaded guilty to hitting a Jewish man over the head with a pint glass for refusing to take off his yarmulke in a Boulder ba...
